PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-14571999-08-130,  ,  TC,  INDUSTRY,  , 
PrecisEnactment of an ORDER AUTHORIZING CERTAIN MAJOR AIR CARRIERS AND PERSONS TO NEGOTIATE AND ENTER INTO ANY CONDITIONAL AGREEMENT - which authorizes Air Canada or Canadian Airlines International Limited and any proponent to develop, assess and discuss a business proposal respecting the ownership, reorganization, restructuring or financing of Air Canada or Canadian Airlines, and to enter into a conditional agreement in respect thereof.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0344 Publication Date: 1999-09-01
Attachments
